messages.content:
can you make this more professional - it's an email to the UN:

Salam Nick, Hanaa and Sandrine,

Thank you for the follow-up. I really appreciate your efforts working with HR on the salary. 
$510/day is acceptable for me, and I'm excited to get the contract issued so that I can begin work in earnest. 

Thank you all very much, and I hope to hear from you soon.

Certainly! Here's a more professional version of your email:

---

**Subject:** Acceptance of Contract Terms

Dear Nick, Hanaa, and Sandrine,

I hope this message finds you well.

Thank you for your prompt follow-up and for your efforts in coordinating with HR regarding the salary discussion. I am pleased to confirm that the rate of $510 per day is acceptable to me.

I look forward to receiving the contract so that I can commence work at the earliest opportunity.

Thank you once again for your assistance. I eagerly await your response.

Best regards,

[Your Full Name]  
[Your Contact Information]

---

Feel free to adjust the closing as needed for your personal touch.
